document_data.name: Patient Fingers Finework
document_data.mainbody: '''Patient Fingers Finework''' was a woodcraft shop in the city of [[Waterdeep]] that was owned by [[Dannath Lisosar]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: This shop was located along [[Sleepers' Walk]],
document_data.Structure: Patient Fingers Finework was a two-story-tall building.
document_data.Services: This business sold both wood carvings and wooden toys.
